title: menuitem role
description: An option in a set of choices contained by a menu or menubar.

assertions.title: convey an appropriate role
assertions.rationale: A screen reader user needs to be aware that they are interacting with a menu item
examples: The role may be explicitly conveyed as something like "menu item"
The role may be implied by the announcement of a menu context

assertions.title: convey the name
assertions.rationale: A screen reader user needs to know what the menu item does

assertions.title: convey information about the position the menu item in the menu
assertions.rationale: The user should be able to determine how many options are in the list and where they are in the list
examples: A screen reader might announce "<name> <role> <2 of 10>" when navigating through a menu
